Articles.Content: How do i make logic connections between nodes?
By "logic connections", do you mean testing a condition? Or do you just mean "this node leads to that node"?

Well, there are a dozen or so possible testable conditions, each with their own special type of logic node. If the condition that you want to test doesn't fall neatly into a pre-assigned category, then you have to use a lot of cleverness to make one (or a combination of more than one) do the same job. In a perfect world where you could test any condition you wanted, what would your condition be?

I mean how to make connection lines that are coloured red and green when wiewing stock missions.

Edited November 20, 2020 by qwerbo

Nodes have arrows going in, and arrows going out. You draw a connection between the arrows just by clicking and dragging your cursor from one arrow to another. That creates a white line. Once you have a line drawn, you can click on it again and you will get a color palette. You can change the colors of each line to be anything you want. The colors are meaningless (except maybe to the person who created the mission).
